meanings.definition: A person who dresses in clothing typically worn by the opposite sex.
meanings.sent1: The theater production featured a group of transvestites who performed with confidence.
meanings.sent2: Some transvestites enjoy expressing themselves through their choice of clothing.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone was surprised to see Bob show up as a transvestite!
meanings.sent4: Her bold fashion choices made her stand out like a transvestite in a crowd of conformists.
meanings.sent5: The image of the transvestites strutting down the runway stayed in the audience's minds long after the show.

meanings.definition: To dress in clothing typically worn by the opposite sex.
meanings.sent1: She decided to transvestite for the Halloween party and wore her brother's clothes.
meanings.sent2: Some people transvestite as a form of self-expression and exploration.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over the vase while trying to transvestite in the curtains.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to transvestite in his sister's dress ended in a torn seam and a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent5: The actor had to transvestite for the role, immersing himself in a new wardrobe to become the character.
